item.title: How to make the barrows a pk zone?
item.dc:creator: @isaac2k4 isaac2k4
item.description:
@isaac2k4 wrote:

[quote=“gman035t, post:14, topic:136638”]And there would be millions of private servers sigh[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 02:55:35 PM[/size][hr]Well I think I got it, does this look right?

public boolean inwildy = false;
public boolean inwildy2 = false;
public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))
{
inwildy = false;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if (isInArea(3522, 9720, 3583, 9675))
{
inwildy2 = ture;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
}[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 02:55:57 PM[/size][hr]NOTE: The IsInArea is the barrows[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 02:56:29 PM[/size][hr]Is anyone gonna help?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 03:23:29 PM[/size][hr]Fine, I was able to do it myself =P[/quote]

congrats

Read full topic

item.description:
@gman035t wrote:

And there would be millions of private servers sigh[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 02:55:35 PM[/size][hr]Well I think I got it, does this look right?

public boolean inwildy = false;
public boolean inwildy2 = false;
public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))
{
inwildy = false;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if (isInArea(3522, 9720, 3583, 9675))
{
inwildy2 = ture;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = false;
}
}[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 02:55:57 PM[/size][hr]NOTE: The IsInArea is the barrows[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 02:56:29 PM[/size][hr]Is anyone gonna help?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2007, 03:23:29 PM[/size][hr]Fine, I was able to do it myself =P

But how do I insert the coordinates of the area IsInBarrows?[/quote]

Oh well, irdc about other people’s problems till I get mine fixed anyway.
[/quote]rotfl i see rotfl why dont you look at another source that has it?[/quote]
I would’ve done that days ago if I knew which source add full smelting…
